conferences.title: The 1st IFIP WG 8.4 International Symposium on E-Business Information Systems Evolution
conferences.description: The inaugural EBISION symposium brought together researchers, practitioners, and students from around the world to explore the evolution of E-Business Information Systems. Held in conjunction with MobiSec 2025, the event featured original research papers, keynote sessions, and discussions on emerging topics including AI-driven business innovation, quantum computing, 6G networks, blockchain, and cybersecurity.
topics: Artificial Intelligence and Data-Driven Business Innovation
Blockchain, Decentralized Finance, and Web 3.0 Economies
Cybersecurity and Digital Trust in EBIS

statistics.description: EBISION brings together researchers, academics, and industry professionals to advance E-Business Information Systems and explore the digital great transformation.
